events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on Main Street at 4 PM yesterday.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the customer's description and submitted evidence.
An agent was assigned to handle the investigation and customer communication regarding the auto accident claim.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and assured the customer of prompt assistance.
The agent requested photos of the vehicle damage, the police report, and a copy of the driver’s license for verification.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos of the car damage and the official police report.
The claims investigation team has begun reviewing all submitted materials and contacted witnesses to confirm accident details.
The investigation concluded verifying fault for the accident and confirming the damage extent as reported by the customer.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the vehicle and related expenses arising from the collision.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling of their case.
The claim was officially approved by the adjuster based on the investigation findings and agreed settlement terms.
The approved settlement amount was disbursed to the customer’s bank account for vehicle repair and other applicable costs.
The claim file was closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
The entire claim record was archived in the system for future reference and compliance purposes, concluding the case.
